message.content:
The task is to identify and extract the line item related to the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life from the given cash flow statement. This is essentially the "Depreciation" expense.

From the given data:

| Account      | Amount   | Date       |
|--------------|----------|------------|
| Depreciation | 45749.30 | 2024-01-28 |

The systematic allocation of the depreciable amount is clearly represented by the "Depreciation" line with the amount 45749.30.

Hence, the answer is:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45749.30'} }
```
